name: AVANU
tag_list: loadbalancer, load-balancers, application-performance, load-balancing, unified-communications, enterprise-database-management, video-streaming, high-availability, health-check, failover, cloud, edge-services, ssl-offload, ssl-acceleration, network, networ
overview:
AVANU is a privately held manufacturer of network infrastructure products and worldwide supplier of networking products and services.

AVANU is headquartered in the Silicon Valley area of California with a satellite office in Washington DC. AVANU is a Certified Participant in the U.S. SBA’s 8(a)/SDB Development Program and WOSB Certification Program.

AVANU manufacturers the WebMux™ dedicated load balancing networking appliances, also known as application delivery controllers, that direct network packets based on OSI layers 2, 3, 4, 5, and 7 protocols to multiple network servers, accomplishing both fault tolerance and high availability.

Application Examples:

The WebMux load balancer is used in a variety of applications, including unified communications, enterprise database management, goverment data center consolidation, video streaming, Web services, and E-Commerce. Applications supported include Apache or Microsoft® IIS HTTP website traffic, Sendmail, Office Exchange Server, SharePoint®, and Oracle® Application Server to sophisticated balancing of multiple tiers of unified communications applications – such as Microsoft® Office Communications Server, Lync Server and beyond.
